title: Ep. 24 But I Don't Like The Way You Make Eggs
description:
Supporting your significant other without being a b*tch is hard, and sometimes you need to let him know you don't like those runny ass eggs. And other times it's way deeper than that. Actor Carlos Aviles breaks down why it's okay to be sensitive towards your woman, how to criticize your man, and drops a few more gems.

Medinah Monroe is getting to go under the knife.

Shayla Raye is still figuring out life as a MILF

And guess who's still single! -Kiki
